info.name: QQ Step
info.description: Use cards to move your dancers across the board or spend Kudos to activate your character's special ability. Win either by removing your opponent's Leader from the board, by removing all your opponent's Friends from the board, or by achieving your Leader's special win condition.
info.attribution:
An original game by Zoql available under CC BY-SA-NC 4.0. Thanks to meBID (programming), chvage (music), Ly (art), rust dogg and Zalf (playtesting).

Special thanks to Shimpei Sato and his game, Onitama. QQ Step was heavily inspired by it.
For more information and additional versions of the game, see https://zoql.itch.io/stardustbutterfly.
